title: University Dropout Analysis
description: Examined data trends to identify patterns and factors influencing student attrition in Business Administration.

title: Amazon Best Seller
description: Extracted data via web scraping, performed data cleaning, and created visualizations to reveal insights into Amazon’s top-selling books.

title: Análisis del Hipotiroidismo Congénito: Datos y Comunicación
description: Este proyecto analiza datos de hipotiroidismo congénito y aborda la falta de comunicación con los padres
